titleStmt.title: Elegies celebrating the happy memory of Sr. Horatio Veere Baron of Tilbury, Collonell Generall of the English, in the United Provinces, and Mr. of the ordnance in England, &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. Badger, for Christopher Meredith, at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Imprimatur signed and dated p. [77]: John Hansley. July 16. 1642.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
